attributes.action: Make all buses in London 2 decks!
attributes.additional_details: I want the government and parliament to do this because it would help develop the cities transport as a lot of are trying to get to work/education or home from work/education and sometimes when the bus is full there’s no space for other individuals. Also some people might feel uncomfortable or might have claustrophobia as small buses are very cramped.
attributes.background: I want the government to develop our buses by making all buses 2 decks because a lot of people have claustrophobia and might feel uncomfortable in the bus.

rejection.details:
Issues relating to London transport are a matter for Transport for London or the Greater London Authority. 

You can contact Transport for London here: https://tfl.gov.uk/help-and-contact/

You can contact the Greater London Authority here: https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/petitions
